text: Ruben Cruz (July 14, 1950 – January 22, 2020) was a Puerto Rican professional wrestler, better known by his ring name Hercules Ayala. He competed in Canadian and international wrestling promotions including the eastern Canadian Grand Prix Wrestling, the Calgary-based Stampede Wrestling, New Japan Pro Wrestling in Japan and World Wrestling Council in Puerto Rico. ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2020 deaths Category:People from Bayamón, Puerto Rico Category:Puerto Rican professional wrestlers Category:Professional wrestling executives
title: Hercules Ayala
